Chapter 2560 - 2560 Chapter 2561-Otherworldly Creatures Descend

2560 Chapter 2561-otherworldly creatures descend

After Lu Ming put away the great desolation spear, he took out a combat sword.

This combat sword was given to him by Bai Ya, and it was a divine weapon.

Back when he was fighting the divine ancestor of the non-human race, Lu Ming had just made a breakthrough and had not had the time to refine this divine weapon. Hence, he could only use the great desolation spear to fight his enemies.

Lu Ming was at a slight disadvantage at first when he used the great desolation spear against the divine ancestor of the non-human race who had a divine weapon. He only suppressed his opponent when he activated the battle character formula that doubled his combat power.

If Lu Ming refined this divine weapon, he would be able to fight the divine ancestor of the non-human race head-on even without activating the battle symbol art to double his combat power.

Lu Ming planned to refine this divine weapon now. In this way, his abilities could be improved.

With a single thought, the ruler’s power enveloped the combat sword and began to refine it.

&Nbsp; the power of a G.o.d could rule the world, and when it came to forging divine weapons, he could do it. at will, and his speed was extremely fast.

In just a few days, Lu Ming had refined the combat sword.

Buzzzzzz!

The combat sword hovered in front of Lu Ming. It vibrated slightly and emitted a mysterious light. ‘Collect!’

With a single thought, Lu Ming’s combat sword turned into a ray of light and disappeared into the s.p.a.ce between his cycbrows.

This was also Lu Ming’s fault. If it were any other celestial Thearch, it would be impossible for them to refine or control divine artifacts.

A divine weapon was a special weapon for the martial G.o.d Realm.

However, there was no problem for Lu Ming to control it with the master’s power.

After refining the divine weapon, Lu Ming planned to start comprehending the path of domination and the battle character formula.

He did not know when the experts from the yuanluo Hall would arrive. Lu Ming had to make the best use of his time and increase his strength.

With a single thought, a scroll in his sea of consciousness unfurled, revealing Jing Yu’s portrait, and the rich power of a sovereign emanated from him.

Lu Ming could sense the power of The Way of the Master at all times.

Lu Ming began to focus on comprehending the way of the ruler.

Time flew by and the days went by. Lu Ming’s comprehension of the path of domination was rapidly improving,

For the past few decades, Lu Ming had been trapped at the peak of the great emperor realm. He was blocked by the heavenly Dao and it was difficult for him to advance.

But now, Lu Ming had broken through. With the help of Jingyu’s portrait, his understanding of the way of of the ruler was improving at an extremely last speed.

Every day, he had quite a harvest..

The strange thing was that the yuanluo Palace remained silent. In the blink of an eye, ten years had pa.s.sed. In the past ten years, the yuanluo Palace had not sent anyone in,

In the past ten years. Lu Ming bad benefited greatly with the help of the shocking feathers painting scroll.

His path of domination had improved greatly, now, I can already break through to become a two-star heavenly Emperor. Let’s do it!

Lu Ming muttered and took out a large number of divine stones, rough stones, and stones of chaos, Originally, he had used up 90% of the divine stones that he had brought out from netherworld mountain when he broke through to the heavenly Emperor realm.

However, they had defeated the evil G.o.d tribe later on. Lu Ming had obtained a large number of divine stones, rough stones, chaos stones, and primordial chaos stones from the evil G.o.d tribe’s powerhouses.

Now, he could help Lu Ming break through.

“Refine!”

With a wave of his hand. Lu Ming’s power enveloped the divine stones, chaos stones, and rough stones. The divine stones and chaos stones exploded upon contact, and energy surged wildly toward Lu Ming. All of them were absorbed and refined by Lu Ming, transforming into World energy and power of the master,

Lu Ming launched an attack on the two-star heavenly Emperor,

Half a month later, Lu Ming’s aura skyrocketed. His cultivation level had become a two-star Celestial Emperor, and his strength had increased by a large margin.

“I’ve broken through!”

Lu Ming revealed a look of joy.

With a breakthrough in his cultivation and an increase in his combat. strength, Lu Ming’s confidence grew. However, the amount of resources consumed was too terrifying. Lu Ming’s resources were almost depleted. If he were to continue breaking through in the future, he didn’t even know what to use to break through, “Let’s not care about that for now!”

Lu Ming shook his head and cultivated for a few days. When his realm had stabilized, Lu Ming began to study the battle character formula.

In the past ten years, Lu Ming had not stopped his comprehension of the battle formula. Ilis understanding of the battle formula was getting deeper and deeper.

Now, on average, he could trigger the double combat power once every five times.

This was undoubtedly very advantageous in a great battle.

“Lu Ming, come quickly!”

At this moment, a voice rang in Lu Ming’s ears. It was zu Long’s voice. It sounded urgent.

“Are the experts of the yuanluo Palace coming?”

The first thing that came to Lu Ming’s mind was the yuanluo Palace.

Ile Look a step forward and the s.p.a.ce cracked. Lu Ming disappeared and reappeared at the original lair of Zulong in the next moment.

The ancestral Dragon was looking at the heaven suppression scal with a serious face.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

At this moment, the heaven suppressing seal was shaking violently. The crack that the divine ancestor had created was expanding as if something was going to charge in.

The two of them were on full alert, ready to attack at any time.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The crack trembled more and more violently. Finally, with a sudden roar, a huge bead rushed in from the crack.

“Attack!”

Lu Ming and the ancestral Dragon were about to attack first to destroy the other party.

However, just as the two of them were about to make a move, the round ball exploded, and terrifying energy spread in all directions.

“Not good!”

The two’s expressions changed. That energy was too terrifying. The two of them quickly retreated to avoid this energy.

In the area where the ball exploded, the s.p.a.ce was completely torn apart, and cracks appeared in the s.p.a.ce within a radius of ten million miles, covering the sky like a spider web.

Buzzzzzz! &Nbsp; Whoosh!…

In the chaotic s.p.a.ce, Lu Ming saw a few streams of light flying in all directions from the area where the bead had exploded. They disappeared in the blink of an eye.

Living beings!

Lu Ming could see clearly that the streams of light were all living creatures that flew to various parts of the heaven realm. Some even flew into the dark void. For a moment, Lu Ming could not determine how many living creatures there were.

It was obvious that a terrifying creature from the outside world had entered and was riding on that bead. After a short while, the chaotic s.p.a.ce recovered. Zu Long’s expression was very ugly.

no wonder no one has entered the yuanluo Palace for the past ten years. It’s to create those round beads to

resist the power of the heaven suppressing scal!

Zu long said with a dark face.

“So, the person who came in wasn’t injured?”

Lu Ming asked.

no, he’s injured. The heaven suppressing seal is very effective against low-leveled ethereal G.o.d Realm cultivators. We just don’t know how many powerful cultivators they have!

Zu long said with a serious face.

In the northern region of the Tai Qing heavenly region, a stream of light flew over and crashed into a

mountain range.

BOOM! BOOM!

The mountain range trembled as the peaks crumbled and exploded.

“What’s going on?”

The G.o.dly beasts and humans who were cultivating in the surroundings were shocked and stood around to

watch.

Hu!

All of a sudden, a beam a f blood-red light emanated from the mountain range in front of them. Then, a terrifying suction force erupted.

“Not good, quickly retreat!”

The humans and G.o.dly beasts who were watching changed their expressions and wanted to retreat. However, they realized that they couldn’t retreat at all. The suction force was too terrifying. Their bodies

were sucked in by it.

After a few screams, there was no more sound.
